properties.author: Stephen McConnell
properties.title: DPML Downloads
properties.description: Information about binary downloads of the DPML component management platform.
properties.keywords: DPML, build, runtime, management, components, soa, java, composition

section.name: Binary Distributions
section.p: The current implementation of the DPML platform is available from our SVN repository.
Please refer to the instructions concerning code checkout, bootstrap and main build procedure.
